name: Culture Clash: An adventure into the art, history and culture of Bristol's infamous Stoke's Croft
description: An insiders look around Bristol's beating heart - Stoke's Croft. Discover the meaning behind some of Bristol's most famous street art pieces while learning more about the past and future of the area itself. Get an insiders look at Bristol's bursting creative scene from outdoor galleries to indoor studios and learn about the history of protest and political unrest that has inspired a generation of artists and musicians in this unique cultural quarter of the city.
